descriptionHtml:
his is now my second mod and i hope you enjoy this one just as much as any others. you can find hexter at teh bannerdmare in White Run he is a orc heavy class with skill sets in archery and 2 hand weapons he can do both heavy and light armor. 

if you have any comonts or concerns please do leave them for i would love to hear from you :D 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------UPDATE 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Hexter Stats 

level 81 O.P tank 

uses two hand sword 
bow 

2h-100 
archery-100 
Harmor-100 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

uses bow only 

Archery-65 
Larmor-65 
Stealth-65 
illusion-65 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Jack Stats 

LVL 45 Combat Mage 

uses Staff, Magicka, and a elven dagger 

Larmor-59 
ALL Magicka- 35_45
